channel.title: CVE Feed for Dropdown and scrollable Text -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dropdown and scrollable Text -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-38353|2024-08-04T01:37:16.517Z -- dropdown%20and%20scrollable%20text -- dropdown%20and%20scrollable%20text
item.description: The Dropdown and scrollable Text WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the content parameter found in the ~/index.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 2.0.
